segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost amusing how unaware she is of the water pouring over the edges.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't fathom how she hasn't felt the cold puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids, on the other hand, are stirring up some excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is stretching so far, he could tip that stool at any moment!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, just waiting with her hand up, looks so eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they realize how risky their little operation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so peaceful, a stark contrast to this kitchen chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should say something, but I can't help but watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Part of me enjoys this little scene, it feels... mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR
